m_szDocSumamry: PE market's deal value jumps to US$69bln in 2015 E-mail China Daily,  April 27, 2016 Adjust font size: China's private equity market's combined deal value jumped 56 percent year-on-year to $69 billion in 2015, a report released on Tuesday by the global management consulting firm Bain & Co said. The growth was driven by a surge in multibillion-dollar deals and an increase in opportunities in the internet sector, the Boston-based company said.
